properties.author: Ideo Technologies
properties.title: JSO - download a tool to compress, optimize JS Files, CSS, IE Cache

meta.name: keyword
meta.content: JavaScript Optimizer - JSO - Downloads - Compress, Optimize JS Files, CSS, IE cache

section.name: Downloads
section.p: JavaScript Optimizer - JSO is a tool that manages JavaScript files into a web application.
You will find on the SourceForge download page two packages :

subsection.name: Package JavaScript Optimizer - JSO
subsection.p:
The "core" main package which contains:
js-optimizer-core-X.X.jar JAR file containing the JavaScript Optimizer library.
js-optimizer-core-X.X-sources.jar JAR file containing the JavaScript Optimizer library sources.
Download theses files on SourceForge.

subsection.name: Package JavaScript Optimizer - JSO demo
subsection.p:
The "demo" web application:
js-optimizer-demo-X.X.war The "Demo" web application showing how to use JavaScript Optimizer.
Download this file on SourceForge.
